server.definition: WITH ptcpts AS ( SELECT ACT_ID FROM ACT_PTCPT_TBL WHERE ENT_ID = $placeid$ UNION ALL SELECT ACT_ID FROM ACT_PTCPT_TBL WHERE ROL_CD_ID IN ('61848557-d78d-40e5-954f-0b9c97307a04','ac05185b-5a80-47a8-b924-060deb6d0eb2') AND ENT_ID IN ( SELECT SRC_ENT_ID FROM ENT_REL_TBL WHERE REL_TYP_CD_ID = '455f1772-f580-47e8-86bd-b5ce25d351f9' AND OBSLT_VRSN_SEQ_ID IS NULL AND TRG_ENT_ID = $placeid$ ) ) SELECT * FROM ACT_VRSN_TBL INNER JOIN ACT_TBL USING (ACT_ID) WHERE OBSLT_UTC IS NULL AND ACT_ID IN (SELECT * FROM ptcpts)
